project_path.BoggieCoin: Experiments/contracts/BoggieCoin Full Smart Contract Security Audit (1)/BoggieCoin

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the potential to exhaust the block's gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply, respectively. These functions may abort with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
